name: double_indemnity
review: There is a reason why Billy Wilder is my favorite director ever--this movie is it. This is the definitive film noir classic. The story and interpretation are as fresh today as they were in 1944. Riveting, engaging, and knock-your-socks-off chemistry between MacMurray and Stanwyck. Whoah!

name: double_indemnity
review: My quintessential Noir story. Chandler's dialogue is pure ear candy here and with more twists than a five-foot curly frie it's fresh each and every time I watch. So damn good it should be made illegal.

name: double_indemnity

name: double_indemnity
review: If like me, you grew up watching reruns of My Three Sons, film noir Fred MacMurray will be a revelation to you. This excellent noir features MacMurray as a hard drinking, tough-guy insurance salesman ensnared into a murder/insurance fraud scheme by the femme-iest and fatale-iest of femme fatales.

name: double_indemnity

name: double_indemnity

review: Fantastic. The treasure is found right when they get there- and the rest of the adventure is trying to hang on to both it and their sanity. Fantastic tale- not sure why Bogie's top credit (probably because he's the man) this one belongs to Tim Holt hands down.

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: A boring over rated hollywood golden age peice of shit.

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: One of my top 5 favorites.

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: What more could be said about this classic? In my opinion, movies simply do not get any better than this.

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: Humphrey Bogart's best film and a tale well worth telling. They just don't make 'em like they used to. This is probably the best movie that searches into the evolution of materialism and the downfall of the greedy.

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: Hard to classify adventure movie, one of Bogie's best performances. Great human drama that hits at the dark core of humanity in some chilling scenes. In its quiet way, the film builds slowly to a surprising and darkly ironic climax that is unforgettable.

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: great portrait of the corruptability of men

name: treasure_of_the_sierra_madre
review: get away from my burro!!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: It's a tough movie to watch, but the more you think about it the better it gets.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The characters, the songs, the movie itself is a classic western-style truth.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: I come here to pay homage to the greatest movie ever made. Ok, many faults, but they only serve to increase the wonder of how much superb-ness (scenes, scenery, philosophy, acting, actors, music) is packed into this work of genius."Just a man." "An ancient race."Thank you to all who were involved.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The greatest western ever made. Brilliant in its casting as well as its execution. Perfectly paced and brilliantly conceived. An epic masterpiece of filmmaking.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: One of the greatest movies ever made, certainly my favorite western.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: As good as a film can get. A true master piece. Young or old, this film needs to be seen.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The greatest western of all-time?

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The best Western Movie in all time.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Boring, unrealistic and pointless.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: One of the great spaghetti westerns. Great cast.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This is an amazing Western.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Wow. It took me more than 40 years to recognize what a great masterpiece this movie is.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Wonderfully badass film

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Top 3 best westerns of all time. Enough said !

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: More Opera than film, this might be Leone's best. Should be in everyone's list of 10 best films. Henry Fonda as the bad guy. Priceless.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Featuring a classic music score, iconic scenes and characters, and brilliant acting, Once Upon a Time in the West has been and always will be the definition of a great western

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Outstanding follow-up, that's all there is. The nameless character or brought back bigger, badder and cooler than ever, an interesting supporting woman, settings like no other, and a soundtrack that will give you chills every time you hear it

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Excellent. Slow moving revenge story. Fonda, Bronson, and Robards shine.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: A revolutionary masterpiece of the Western genre, filled with high level direction, sweeping cinematography, haunting music and landmark performances, Sergio Leone's fourth film stands proud as a timeless cinematic myth that will appeal to audiences fifty years from now.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Sergio Leone truly summarised his admiration for the old west and the western genre with this cumulative masterpiece. I'm now rather addicted to this film and have found myself coming back to it again and again.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: A true masterpiece from Sergio Leone! Everything is spectacular about this movie and perhaps the peak of Western genre.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Greatest film opening ever

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Sergio Leone Western film is unique and great from the editing to the score and to trio performance by Bronson, Fonda, and Cardinale

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The greatest Filme made ever!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Leone's ultimate Western is this classic operatic elegy for the dying genre - a perfect masterclass of cinema with unforgettable scenes from beginning to end, memorable dialogue, an evocative use of silence, outstanding performances and a wonderful score.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Nobody did it better than Leone, miles ahead of his contemporaries. Deliberately paced Western with a truly sensational cast; not sure who is better between Fonda, Bronson, Cardinale and Robards.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Part thrilling look at westward expansion, part revenge thriller; all through the eyes of the greatest western director of all time; Once Upon a Time in the West is the most magnificent western I've ever seen and is a crowning achievement for director Sergio Leone.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This slow and somber counterpart to the up-tempo and quirky The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly is an absolute masterpiece with another beautiful score from Ennio Morricone, and brilliant performances from Charles Bronson, Henry Fonda, Claudia Cardinale, etc..

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Very touching, for the great spirits of the great railway times

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: another one of my favorites still. great actors, great music and great western. They don't make them like this anymore.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Best western. Good music, story, acting, scenery.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Saying anything other than, "brilliant" would be saying too much.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Best film ever made. Discuss.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: I would put this ahead of The good, the bad & the ugly anytime. A Sergio Leone masterpiece with every trace of his trademark style and a powerful composition by Ennio Morricone.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Epic to look at and listen to. An absolute classic

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: After The Good,the Bad and the Ugly,Sergio Leone prooved in all the word another time that he is the king of spaguetti's western!!!!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: excellent west excellent film a true masterpiece. Not to be missed.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: They don't make them like they used to. A Spaghetti western masterpiecethat all imitators try to succeed in and fail.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Classic ..that's what we call a movie !acting at its finest .Greatest cocktail of all :acting,story line ,music Filming ,location ..etc

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: oh my god gets better everytime i watch it. greatest western ever made

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Once of the most intense western epics I have seen. Great Morricone music.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Forever my favorite movie.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: One of the greatest westerns of all time!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Usually I don't go for western movies, but this being one of my dad's favourite movies, I had no choice but to watch it. To my own surprise I ended up really enjoying myself and it now ranks among my favourite "classic" films.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Easily one of the best westerns ever made. The casting of Fonda as a villain was brave and he pulled it off brilliantly. Leone proved with this epic film that he was a true master of the genre.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: My favorite western ,spaghetti or otherwise, thus far.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Leone's best film realises the emotion latent in camp, the sexual power in a harmonica or a loaded gun, and the nasty side of Henry Fonda. It's a send-up of all cinema, and at the same time it's all cinema's completion.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: An Overwhelming Orchestration. Leone and Morricone were born for each other. 10/10

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Bronson replaces Eastwood and is the fucking balls. Morricone's soundtrack especially 'Man with Harmonica', the opening scene, that final showdown and a smoking hot Claudia Cardinale. Jason Robards offeres up good support and Henry Fonda is a right nasty cunt.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: I'll keep this review short: This is the best Western ever put on screen. Period.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Henry Fonda is brilliant as Frank, Charles Bronson is at his intimidating best as Harmonica and the direction from Sergio Leone is truly inspired. Full review later.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: grew up with this, i cannot fault this film, what's not to like?

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: At 2 hours and 40 minuets Once Upon a Time in the West challenges us to stick with it's languid pace and bold cinematic philosophies. Yet there's no denying this as one of the greatest westerns ever made.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: this movie is a classic

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: when new film directors want to understand how continuity is supposed to be done in a film, they should study this movie relentlessly.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Greatest opening of all time!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Best western ever!!!!!!!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The best movie made by Sergio Leone. Away from Clint Eastwood and the gang from the "Dollars Trilogy", Leone presents a much complex history about love, loss, revenge and survival in the west. MAGNUM OPUS!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Fantastic film, but you have to be able to tolerate the spaghetti western characteristics which I enjoy, but newer folks will not

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: A true masterpiece in every sense of the word!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Sergio Leone, the master of the spaghetti western, has made another masterpiece.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Once Upon a Time in the West is one of the greatest westerns ever made, and it's one of many films that show that Sergio Leone was one of the best directors of his time.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Yep. The best western ever made.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Beautifully shot by the amazingly talented director, Sergio Leone, and accompanied by an amazing musical score and outstanding performances by Fonda & Bronson, Once Upon a Time in the West is one fun, suspenseful, classic Spaghetti Western & in my opinion is the greatest Western of all time.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Exquisite in almost every way.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Perfection. Slow? No its perfection and a western. Arguably the best western.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The music is epic, the script is good and the characters are compelling.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The ultimate spaghetti western, one of the greatest Westerns of all-time, and one of the single most powerful pieces of cinema ever made. Leone's nearly three-hour epic encapsulates the humanity of a growing American society within this corrupt and visually outstanding fairy-tale.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The best western I've ever seen. Magnificent screenplay, awesome acting and especially marvelous music by Morricone.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This thundering Western flick should be listed as a synonym for 'epic' in every dictionary. Although I haven't seen all of the so called Spaghetti Western films I bet that this is the most marvelous one.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The #1 All-Time Western!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: One of the best Westerns ever made! Definitely my favorite Sergio Leone film as it is well written, well acted, beautifully filmed and features a great score. Every film fan owes it to themselves to see this!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: My favorite western movie.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: I am now a Sergio Leone fan. What a fantastic movie. My favorite western of all time is the Coen Brothers remake of True Grit. This gives it a run for the money. Henry Fonda as a bad guy was so cool...and the music...wow!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: One of the finest westerns ever made, an undeniable masterpiece with a great score, and a wonderful cast.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: the greatest western movie of all times!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: A must-see for film fans, Once Upon a Time in the West shall always remain the definitive Western.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Great Ennio Morricone score. The main theme is grand. Fonda, Bronson, and Robards..Lets not forget Claudia Cardinale. It doesn't get much better than the opening sequence but there is plenty of awesomeness to go around to fill the almost 3 hour running time.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: All time greatest Western from a director that had too few films. Sergio Leone fucking created the Spaghetti Western genre, and he ended it with this movie that turned a kickass action western into a piece of art. Mmmm. Love it.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This movie belongs to some class that is above 'Very Good'. Very very good piece of western movie by Sergio Leone.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Greatest cowboy film ever made..... No question.... It has the best cast , best director of western era and best no name characther of cowboy storys.... "Man With The Harmonica"........

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: the scene where it all get s clear what those flashbacks of harmonica(bronson)were all about;the camera zooming out ,his brother on his shoulders

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Once Upon a Time in the West is one of the greatest westerns ever. Sergio Leone has made a great film that is well plotted and well acted. Henry Fonda is great as the villain, playing against type. As, well, as Charles Bronson and Jason Robards.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: My favorite film of all time. Every aspect of this film sybolizes perfection in film, from the acting, backstory, score, pacing, and climax. A must watch 5 - 10 times minimum. See this movie!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Epic.. Iconic... Legendary.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: YESSS! I finally get to rate this....simply the best Western ever made, by an Italian filmaker, no less. Great on so many levels and the payoff is just wonderful. GO WATCH THIS MOVIE NOW!!!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Sergio Leone almost surpasses, the good, the bad, and the ugly while paying a tribute to the great John Ford. The only thing missing for me was Clint Eastwood. An almost perfect movie!!!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: great movie. needs more love

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The only time I saw Fonda play a bad guy!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: So cool. Just so deadpan cool! One is lulled into the dreamy pacing of the story from the very beginning.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The greatest western ever made!!

review: You want a perfect movie? Well here it is.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: A classic in its own right - and the best western of the 60s.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: An epic western of David Lean-esque size that is purely Sergio Leone. A haunting harmonica tune plays off the conflict that is preceded only by Leone's For A Few Dollars More medley.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This is One of the Best Westerns I have ever seen!. The Music in this movie is so beautiful it brings tears to my eyes(Claudia's Theme). Just purchased the restored version. FANTASTIC MOVIE!!!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Sergio Leone's Once Upon a Time in the West is one of the greatest movies ever made. The story is multi-layered, the characters are complex, and the only other Western film to match wits with this one was crafted by the same legendary director.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The scores of Morricone are as epic as always, this movie brings all the characters and landscapes that made Spaghetti Westerns so memorable. The masterpiece of one of the finest directors of Westerns.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: So violent and good, Sergio is one spagetthi western film maker to watch. Wait what Fonda is a bad guy? Lol.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: By far one of the greatest cinematographic pieces of work, unpredictable, unforgettable. The best revenge flick you'll ever get to see based on the western theme, thanks to a magestic music, brilliant dialogues and a perfect direction from Sergio Leone.EXCELENTE.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This is the best western ever made, Unforgiven is 2nd and The Good, the Bad and the Ugly is 3rd. IMHO.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: It is one of the most perfect films I have ever seen. My gosh, what a film. For me, it's tied with The Good, The Bad and the Ugly for the greatest Western ever made.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The best western Leone ever made! A classic!

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Loved Henry Fonda in this flick.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: I love the movie and i love the soundtrack.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This beautiful slow epic by Sergio Leone, featuring four first-class actors and an aching score by Ennio Morricone, is one of the rare and unforgettable masterpieces of cinematography.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: The opening sequence of this movie is so beautifully filmed. Hardly a word is spoken, yet it grips you.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: "you clicked one star too many", "no i clicked one star too few". just don't get any better.wonderful beginning, story, direction, scenery, actors and the ending does take your breath away.AWESOME.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: My all-time favorite movie.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: This is one of those movies that you have to let sit and stew for awhile. I don't get it quite yet. It seems a little overcooked. Some of the scenes seem to drag along for no reason. The plot is rather convoluted and confusing at times. Still, the stuff that does work works very well.

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: In my opinion, not only is this superior to The Good, The Bad and The Ugly and the best of Sergio Leone, it is also the greatest of all Westerns. "Keep your lovin brother happy"

name: once_upon_a_time_in_the_west
review: Stunning direction and fantastic story making. The first scene is compelling and told without any words being spoken. I love the way the story unfolds to the dramatic conclusion.
